solution_line_template: The number of tickets needed for the go-karts is {go_kart_rides} × {go_kart_ticket_cost} = <<{go_kart_rides}*{go_kart_ticket_cost}={go_kart_tickets}>>{go_kart_tickets}.
The number of tickets needed for the bumper cars is {bumper_car_rides} × {bumper_car_ticket_cost} = <<{bumper_car_rides}*{bumper_car_ticket_cost}={bumper_car_tickets}>>{bumper_car_tickets}.
